appName: EZ360: VR Video Sync & Remote Playback
displayName: EZ360: VR Video Sync & Remote Playback
display_name: EZ360: VR Video Sync & Remote Playback
display_long_description:
EZ360: The Ultimate 360° Video Playback & Sync Solution for VR

EZ360 is an all-in-one solution that combines seamless 360° video playback with powerful remote video distribution and synchronization. Whether you're managing a single headset or deploying content globally, EZ360 eliminates the need for manual file transfers and complicated setup.

Our VR Sync feature allows you to synchronize video playback across multiple headsets—perfect for group training, education, or immersive experiences where timing is critical. Videos can be remotely pushed and updated via our cloud-based portal, making remote management effortless.

Once downloaded, videos can be played offline, and the player auto-launches when the headset is worn—creating a hands-free, intuitive experience. Want full control? You can also preload content manually when needed.

Key Features:
Effortless VR video sync across multiple devices
Auto-play and auto-stop on headset wear/remove
Fully remote video distribution and content updates
Custom branding: add your logo, background, and thumbnails
Supports mono and stereoscopic 2D/180/360 videos (use "_TB" in filename)
Spatial Audio (.tbe) and MP4 support
QHD video quality
Simple and user-friendly interface

👉 To get started, sign up for an account at www.ez-360.com and begin managing your VR content with ease.
